headline: Show HN: Yet another artsy text to image generator but in multiple languages
description:
I've always wanted to draw and paint but never had the talent to do it. Art class at school was always a messy experience for me, a more comical one than a creative one.

Now, creating art is so easy. You just type what you want, in any language you want, and just keep going... it's a very satisfying and very relaxing experience . I find myself keep trying to create something new, something cool or weird. It's a lot of fun .

I hope you can discover this new art form too, and create something new, strange, or beautiful.

Try us out, free, in any language at https://art.elbo.ai, and let us know how you felt when you did.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 又是一个艺术化的文本到图像生成器，但有多种语言。
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 又是一個藝術化的文本到圖像生成器，但有多種語言。
